Class LoginPage

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
ticktocktrack.gui.LoginPage
public class LoginPage extends javafx.application.Application
JavaFX application class for the Login Page. Handles the UI setup and initializes the login logic.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

    • handleLoginClick

      private void handleLoginClick(String username, String password, javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Handles the login button click event. Attempts to authenticate the user with the provided username and password. If login is successful, proceeds to the next stage or scene.
      Parameters:
      username - the entered username
      password - the entered password
      primaryStage - the primary stage of the application

    • openAdminDashboard

      private void openAdminDashboard(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Opens the Admin Dashboard in a new window and closes the current login window.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the current login window's stage to be closed
